name: MyGarage
0:
”Alexa, ask My Garage to pick up my vehicle”
”Alexa. open My Garage”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my garage
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Don't like going to the dealership, trying to navigate their website or waiting on hold? Now you can book service without ever lifting a finger using RedCap's My Garage and Amazon Alexa. Participating dealers can pick up your car and bring you a loaner for the most convenient and enjoyable service experience possible. Prefer to bring your vehicle to the dealership? No problem. RedCap's My Garage allows you to book service appointments however you choose. Just say "Alexa, open My Garage."
 
Dealers… Improve customer loyalty, fill your service bays, reduce your loaner costs, and run more efficiently by offering RedCap Service Valet. With RedCap your customers are never inconvenienced by having to bring in their car according to your schedule. Service Valet can be booked using our dealer dashboard or by your customers on your website and now with Amazon Alexa.
